Get Started

Deck Stores

Your comprehensive source for IMPA and ISSA catalogue deck stores. From MEG4 compliant ropes to specialized equipment, we ensure your vessel operates with certified quality materials.

Ropes & Hawsers

Premium quality ropes with class and test certifications including MEG4 compliance. Available in various breaking strengths and load capacities.

Key Features:

  • MEG4 Compliant Mooring Ropes
  • High-Strength Towing Lines
  • Certified Wire Ropes
  • Synthetic Fiber Ropes
  • Custom Breaking Strength Options
Class Certified MEG4 Compliant Load Tested

Safety & Protection

Comprehensive range of safety equipment and protective gear meeting international maritime standards.

Key Features:

  • Personal Protective Equipment
  • Fire Fighting Systems
  • Life-Saving Apparatus
  • Safety Harnesses & Lines
  • Emergency Response Equipment
SOLAS Approved ISO Certified

Deck Maintenance

Complete range of deck maintenance supplies and equipment to keep your vessel in optimal condition.

Key Features:

  • Paint & Coatings
  • Cleaning Supplies
  • Rust Treatment Products
  • Deck Tools & Equipment
  • Maintenance Accessories
ISO Certified Environmental Compliance

Cargo Handling

Essential cargo handling and securing equipment meeting international safety standards.

Key Features:

  • Lashing Equipment
  • Cargo Securing Devices
  • Container Fittings
  • Lifting Gear
  • Safety Nets & Covers
Load Tested Safety Certified

Navigation & Communication

Modern navigation and communication equipment to ensure safe and efficient vessel operations.

Key Features:

  • Navigation Lights

IMO Compliant Type Approved

Contact Us View Catalog

Alcanza Ship Services has 30 years of experience in ship supply and spare parts. We provide new-built stores to shipyards and technical stores to ports and the offshore oil & gas sector. Recently, we expanded to supply cruise liners, prioritizing the health and safety of seafarers on all vessels we serve.
